reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived in perfect condition
reviews.reviewText: Got it for my husband. Arrived early and in perfect condition!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dark souls fans
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my dark souls-loving boyfriend. It seems really good for the price, honestly. You’ll save yourself a lot of money by buying this version instead of each separate comic/graphic novel. My only complaint would be that the cover is a little flimsy, but I really can’t be too picky considering how cheap it was for the entire binding, so I’m not knocking off any stars for that.Boyfriend seems to like it, so I overall recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Written in alot of old English.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 16 yr old son and he loved it. Didn't zoom through it like he normally does (fast reader) because alot of it is written in old English. Which I like it took him alittle longer. He loves it and thinks it's the best book he has gotten thus far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item! must have for any Souls fan.
reviews.reviewText: Item showed up in great condition. Binding was perfect. Art is outstanding. No complaints here. If someone you know is a Souls fan this would make a great gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3.5 Stars, Beautiful Art, Good Stories, bad Set Up
reviews.reviewText: Gorgeous art for the first 3 stories, and varied (but still aesthetically pleasing) art for the misc stories, but my true rating which Amazon won’t let me put is 3.5/5 stars due to the set up of the stories. It’s obvious if you have read comics (good* comics) before that they didn’t quite know what they were doing when setting up panels because some stories are hard to follow with the eye.The second story “Winter’s Spite” has a few fighting scenes that lost me completely. And the third story is straight up confusing — there were moments of clarity, but over all the story was all over the place. Ironically, there’s a misc story near the end that’s drawn by a experienced comic artist, only 3 pages, and it’s stark the difference.Overall, I don’t regret buying this. If you’re a fan of dark souls, buy it. At the very least it has gorgeous art, and it has a few fun pieces of lore (unsure if canon) that I thought were interesting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful artwork and awesome story ripped straight out of The greatest game ever made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My Fiancé really loved the gift. Loves the artwork.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Talk about low quality holy crap!
reviews.reviewText: First off let me say I own all the individual comics to this complete collection and each of those has more quality than this heap of crap. The paper is of the lowest quality, the binding is just a thin layer of glue, and the actual cover of it is as thin as the pages. I don't understand why you would put together a complete collection that is this low quality at 34.99 US / 44.99 CAN / 31.00UK That's a good chunk of change and honestly if you are hitting close to 40 mid as well go to 40 and make it a hardback.Also what is up with all the trashy full capslock reviews on the outside of the book? It's horrible and takes away from the actual art and book its self. Here are a few examples, yes these are directly from the book "STUNNING AND GRUESOME IN EQUAL MEASURE" BY FLICKERING MYTH who the heck is flickering myth and why would I care what they think? Also stunning and gruesome in equal measure? Have they ever played dark souls? Jesus. The back is just as worse "JAW-DROPPINGLY GORGEOUS FROM START TO FINISH" - WE THE NERDY who the heck is "we the nerdy"? It's as if they found some group of losers who could not write school reports very well and asked them for one liners. Oh listen to this one guys "THE FIRST COMIC TO CAPTURE THE ESSENCE OF THE VIDEO GAME ALMOST PERFECTLY" - MULTIVERSITY COMICS who are you again? there are more comics? what in gods name are these horrible texts taking up the front and back. I will upload pictures of how stupid this stuff is for you guys to see yourself.As a collector this book is already in bad condition when it came because of how thin the pages and the cover is. It just feels bad in the hands and worse turning pages, like so bad you worry you will tear a page when you turn it. The thing could not make the journey in the envelope Amazon sent and has corner damage, and damage underneath. I just can't justify the price tag of this low quality product.TL:DR Low quality collection, super thin pages, horrible cover thickness and just feels bad. Get the individual comics if you want them this is not the go to.
Um excelente colecionável para os fãs da franquia.Para quem gosta de quadrinhos e é fã de dark souls, não pense 2x. Vá em frente e compre!

No esperaba que todo el comic estuviera a color lo cual fue una grata sorpresa , llego muy bien empaquetado solo que sin el plastico envolvente en el que normalmente los comics o libros nuevos vienen . fuera de eso todo rapido y genial

reviews.reviewTitle: A great read for fans and newcomers alike.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Dark Souls: Complete Collection comic book and was genuinely surprised when it arrived in such immaculate condition. As a fan of the Dark Souls video game franchise, I bought it mainly for novelty, but it exceeded my expectations in many ways. The storyline and artwork were engaging, and the characters were well-developed. I particularly enjoyed the attention to detail and the way the comic book expanded on the lore of the game. Overall, I found it to be an enjoyable read and would recommend it to any fan of the Dark Souls franchise or anyone looking for an engaging comic book. The Dark Souls: Complete Collection comic book is a great addition to any collection and a must-read for fans of the series.

Producto excelente, con una gran recopilación de comics del universo de Dark Souls con un dibujo espectacular. Una pena que haya llegado con las todas las esquinas algo dañas por culpa del reparto y envío sin protección, por eso no lo doy las 5 estrellas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 1, 2023
